description: Sent when the signal status attribute of an

event.Summary: Signal status of interface $v2 on slot $v4, txPort $v5 is down

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfTxSignalStatusDown LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfIndex u 9999 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfName s EXAMPLE LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfSubrack u 0 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfSlot u 0 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfTxPort u 0 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfRxPort u 0 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfEntityId u 9999 LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfTxSignalStatus i 1

description: An arbitrary index assigned to each entry.
variables.name: LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfIndex

description: The management name of the interface, for
indicates sub-rack, the second slot number and
the third is the port number.

variables.name: LUM-MULTIRATE-MIB::mrtIfSubrack

description: The operational state for outgoing (TX) signal
down - A fault that would lead to a protection
degraded - The signal quality is impaired.
